entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ```await``` completion should trigger on ```yield``` in IAsyncEnumerables #75675
    Backlog

Closed

  • An `unmanaged` constraint check causes a stack overflow in an error scenario #75620
    17.13
  • IntelliSense cannot detect IAsyncEnumerable's yield return type when that parameter is used #68027
    17.13
  • Programmatically (from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Project) check for <CodeAnalysisRuleSet> #38978
  • Linux Arm64 build csc hangs with 9.0.100-rc.1 SDK #75243
  • Generate new type dialog from struct interface list as generic type parameter only allows generating interfaces #63280
    Backlog
  • Cyclic assignment should generate a ref safety error #75592
    17.13
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35429.238 #75673

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flow of CompilerGeneratedFilesOutputPath from CPS #75674
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Detect struct cycles caused by erroneous field-like event declarations #75668
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Bind lambda in `yield return` despite errors #75660
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure discards are initially soft selected in VSCode #75655
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix generate type dialog invoked on type argument in a base list #63378
    Area-IDE, Community, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in VirtualCharService.CreateVirtualCharSequence #75654
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in TextDocumentStates.AddRange #75640
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix ref analysis of self-assignment #75618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next

Updated

  • Ref safety: replace uint scope with struct Lifetime #75647
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Backlog
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • VB: Recognize and check an `unmanaged` constraint #75665
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, 17.13
  • Reduce memory and CPU costs due to SegmentedList usage #75661
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, VSCode
  • Handle directives in trailing trivia #75595
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in ProjectSystemProjectFactory.ConvertMetadataReferencesToProjectReferences_NoLock #75646
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractAsynchronousTaggerProvider.ComputeDifference #75639
    Area-IDE, untriaged
